channel.title: Looking for a copy of runescape 2
channel.description:
You know runescape, the old wildy. Not the caves where you pk right now.
I'm looking for; Runescape (original) drops. Runescape (original) npc. Runescape (original) mobs.
You know, like a copy. It should be empty at first ^^ Just some admin-commands, i can make them myself. Anyway, i've had it b4 , but theres like 400 pages on server-download.
If you find it, please PM.

item.title: Looking for a copy of runescape 2
item.dc:creator: @i_looter_i i looter i
item.description:

I’m looking for;
Runescape (original) drops.
Runescape (original) npc.
Runescape (original) mobs.

You know, like a copy. It should be empty at first ^^
Just some admin-commands, i can make them myself.
Anyway, i’ve had it b4 , but theres like 400 pages on server-download.

If you find it, please PM.[/quote]

RuneScape

RuneScape - Free Fantasy MMORPG Browser Game

A free browser based MMORPG game updated with fresh content each month. Set in a medieval fantasy realm; experience story-driven quests, master skills and make new friends.

item.title: Looking for a copy of runescape 2
item.dc:creator: @_Vengeance _Vengeance
item.description:
@_Vengeance wrote:

[quote=“Chemical Reaction, post:2, topic:186771”]Ha!
HAHAHAHAH
That’s impossible to get an EXACT copy of runescape before Bounty hunter and all that gay crap[/quote]

No, it isn’t. There is just absolutely no point making a replica, because if you want to play Runescape, you can just play the official game.

Read full topic
